patthana1.17:1.1: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— maggārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:2.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— maggārammaṇaṁ
patthana1.17:2.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggādhipatī tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho. Dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:3.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—maggārammaṇaṁ
patthana1.17:3.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:4.1: Maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— maggahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:5.1: Maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— maggahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggādhipatī tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:6.1_0: Maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—maggahetukaṁ
patthana1.17:6.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggahetukā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:7.1: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— maggādhipatiṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:8.1: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— maggādhipatiṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:9.1: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— maggādhipatiṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggahetukā tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:10.1_0: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—maggādhipatiṁ
patthana1.17:10.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:11.1_0: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—maggādhipatiṁ
patthana1.17:11.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggahetukā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:12.1_0: Maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—maggārammaṇañca
patthana1.17:12.1_1: maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:13.1_0: Maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—maggārammaṇañca
patthana1.17:13.1_1: maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggādhipatī tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:14.1_0: Maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā
patthana1.17:14.1_1: uppajjanti hetupaccayā—maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā
patthana1.17:14.1_2: ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:15.1_0: Maggahetukañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—maggahetukañca
patthana1.17:15.1_1: maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggahetukā tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:16.1_0: Maggahetukañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—maggahetukañca
patthana1.17:16.1_1: maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggādhipatī tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:17.1_0: Maggahetukañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā
patthana1.17:17.1_1: uppajjanti hetupaccayā—maggahetukañca maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggahetukā
patthana1.17:17.1_2: ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:18.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … adhipatipaccayā
patthana1.17:19.1_0: Hetuyā sattarasa, ārammaṇe adhipatiyā anantare samanantare sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye
patthana1.17:19.1_1: upanissaye purejāte āsevane kamme āhāre indriye jhāne magge sampayutte vippayutte
patthana1.17:19.1_2: atthiyā natthiyā vigate avigate sattarasa. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.17:21.1: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— ahetukaṁ maggārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:22.1: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā— maggārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:23.1: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā— maggārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggādhipatī tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:24.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti naadhipatipaccayā—maggārammaṇaṁ
patthana1.17:24.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:25.1: Maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā— maggahetuke khandhe paṭicca maggahetukādhipati.
patthana1.17:26.1: Maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā— maggahetuke khandhe paṭicca maggādhipati adhipati.
patthana1.17:27.1: Maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti naadhipatipaccayā—maggahetuke khandhe paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca adhipati.
patthana1.17:28.1_0: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā— maggādhipatī
patthana1.17:28.1_1: khandhe paṭicca maggādhipati adhipati. Maggādhipatiṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā
patthana1.17:29.1: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā— maggādhipatiṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:30.1: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā— maggādhipatī khandhe paṭicca maggahetuko adhipati.
patthana1.17:31.1_0: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti naadhipatipaccayā—maggādhipatiṁ
patthana1.17:31.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:32.1: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti naadhipatipaccayā—maggādhipatī khandhe paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca adhipati.
patthana1.17:33.1_0: Maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—maggārammaṇañca
patthana1.17:33.1_1: maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:34.1_0: Maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—maggārammaṇañca
patthana1.17:34.1_1: maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggādhipatī tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:35.1_0: Maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā
patthana1.17:35.1_1: uppajjanti naadhipatipaccayā—maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca
patthana1.17:35.1_2: maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:36.1: Maggahetukañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—maggahetuke ca maggādhipatī ca khandhe paṭicca maggahetuko adhipati.
patthana1.17:37.1: Maggahetukañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—maggahetuke ca maggādhipatī ca khandhe paṭicca maggādhipati adhipati.
patthana1.17:38.1_0: Maggahetukañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā
patthana1.17:38.1_1: uppajjanti naadhipatipaccayā—maggahetuke ca maggādhipatī ca khandhe paṭicca maggahetuko
patthana1.17:39.1: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā … napacchājātapaccayā. (Paripuṇṇā dvepi.)
patthana1.17:40.1: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naāsevanapaccayā— maggārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:41.1: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati naāsevanapaccayā— maggārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggādhipatī tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:42.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti naāsevanapaccayā—maggārammaṇaṁ
patthana1.17:42.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:43.1: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati naāsevanapaccayā— maggādhipatiṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:44.1: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naāsevanapaccayā— maggādhipatiṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:45.1_0: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti naāsevanapaccayā—maggādhipatiṁ
patthana1.17:45.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:46.1_0: Maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naāsevanapaccayā—maggārammaṇañca
patthana1.17:46.1_1: maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:47.1_0: Maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati naāsevanapaccayā—maggārammaṇañca
patthana1.17:47.1_1: maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggādhipatī tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:48.1_0: Maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā
patthana1.17:48.1_1: uppajjanti naāsevanapaccayā—maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca
patthana1.17:48.1_2: maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:49.1: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā— maggārammaṇe khandhe paṭicca maggārammaṇā cetanā.
patthana1.17:50.1: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā— maggārammaṇe khandhe paṭicca maggādhipati cetanā.
patthana1.17:51.1: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti nakammapaccayā—maggārammaṇe khandhe paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipati ca cetanā.
patthana1.17:52.1: Maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā— maggahetuke khandhe paṭicca maggahetukā cetanā.
patthana1.17:53.1: Maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā— maggahetuke khandhe paṭicca maggādhipati cetanā.
patthana1.17:54.1: Maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti nakammapaccayā—maggahetuke khandhe paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca cetanā.
patthana1.17:55.1: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā— maggādhipatī khandhe paṭicca maggādhipati cetanā. (Pañca pañhā.)
patthana1.17:56.1: Maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā. (Paṭhamaghaṭane tīṇi.)
patthana1.17:57.1: Maggahetukañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā. (Dutiyaghaṭane tīṇi pañhā.)
patthana1.17:58.1: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā. (Paripuṇṇaṁ.)
patthana1.17:59.1: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati namaggapaccayā— ahetukaṁ maggārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana1.17:60.1: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā. (Paripuṇṇaṁ, arūpanti niyāmetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.17:61.1_0: Nahetuyā ekaṁ, naadhipatiyā sattarasa, napurejāte sattarasa, napacchājāte sattarasa,
patthana1.17:61.1_1: naāsevane nava, nakamme sattarasa, navipāke sattarasa, namagge ekaṁ, navippayutte
patthana1.17:63.1: Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā sattarasa, napurejāte sattarasa, napacchājāte sattarasa, naāsevane nava, nakamme sattarasa, navipāke navippayutte sattarasa. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.17:65.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṁ, anantare ekaṁ, samanantare ekaṁ …pe… jhāne sampayutte vippayutte atthiyā natthiyā vigate avigate ekaṁ. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.17:68.1: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— maggārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:69.1: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— maggārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ maggādhipatīnaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:70.1: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Iminā kāraṇena sattarasa pañhā kātabbā.)
patthana1.17:71.1_0: Maggahetuko dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā
patthana1.17:71.1_1: vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti, cetopariyañāṇena maggahetukacittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ
patthana1.17:71.1_2: jānanti, maggahetukā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa,
patthana1.17:72.1: Maggahetuko dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:73.1: Maggahetuko dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:74.1: Maggādhipati dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:75.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā
patthana1.17:75.1_1: vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti, cetopariyañāṇena maggādhipaticittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ
patthana1.17:75.1_2: jānanti, maggādhipatī khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa,
patthana1.17:76.1: Maggādhipati dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:77.1_0: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
patthana1.17:77.1_1: paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti, cetopariyañāṇena maggahetukamaggādhipaticittasamaṅgissa
patthana1.17:77.1_2: cittaṁ jānanti, maggahetukā ca maggādhipatī ca khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa,
patthana1.17:78.1: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggādhipatissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:79.1: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:80.1: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. **Sahajātādhipati**—maggārammaṇādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:81.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. **Sahajātādhipati**—maggārammaṇādhipati
patthana1.17:82.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena
patthana1.17:83.1: Maggahetuko dhammo maggahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. **Sahajātādhipati**—maggahetukādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:84.1: Maggahetuko dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. **Ārammaṇādhipati**—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:85.1_0: Maggahetuko dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana1.17:85.1_1: sahajātādhipati. **Ārammaṇādhipati**—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:86.1: Maggahetuko dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. **Ārammaṇādhipati**—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:87.1_0: Maggahetuko dhammo maggahetukassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena
patthana1.17:88.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana1.17:88.1_1: sahajātādhipati. **Ārammaṇādhipati**—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:89.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana1.17:89.1_1: sahajātādhipati. **Ārammaṇādhipati**—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:90.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. **Sahajātādhipati**—maggādhipati
patthana1.17:90.1_1: adhipati sampayuttakānaṁ maggahetukānaṁ khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:91.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana1.17:91.1_1: sahajātādhipati. **Ārammaṇādhipati**—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:92.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggahetukassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena
patthana1.17:93.1_0: Maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena
patthana1.17:93.1_1: paccayo. **Sahajātādhipati**—maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca adhipati sampayuttakānaṁ
patthana1.17:94.1_0: Maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggādhipatissa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena
patthana1.17:94.1_1: paccayo. **Sahajātādhipati**—maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca adhipati sampayuttakānaṁ
patthana1.17:95.1_0: Maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa
patthana1.17:95.1_1: adhipatipaccayena paccayo. **Sahajātādhipati**—maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca adhipati
patthana1.17:95.1_2: sampayuttakānaṁ maggārammaṇānañca maggādhipatīnañca khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:96.1: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. **Ārammaṇādhipati**—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:97.1_0: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena
patthana1.17:97.1_1: paccayo. **Sahajātādhipati**—maggahetukā ca maggādhipatī ca adhipati sampayuttakānaṁ
patthana1.17:98.1_0: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggādhipatissa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena
patthana1.17:98.1_2: maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti. **Sahajātādhipati**—maggahetukā ca maggādhipatī
patthana1.17:98.1_3: ca adhipati sampayuttakānaṁ maggādhipatīnaṁ khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:99.1_0: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa
patthana1.17:99.1_1: adhipatipaccayena paccayo. **Ārammaṇādhipati**—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ
patthana1.17:100.1_0: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggahetukassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa
patthana1.17:100.1_1: adhipatipaccayena paccayo. **Sahajātādhipati**—maggahetukā ca maggādhipatī ca adhipati
patthana1.17:100.1_2: sampayuttakānaṁ maggahetukānañca maggādhipatīnañca khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:101.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— purimā purimā
patthana1.17:101.1_1: maggārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ maggārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena
patthana1.17:101.1_2: paccayo. Āvajjanā maggārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:102.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— purimā purimā
patthana1.17:102.1_1: maggārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ maggādhipatīnaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena
patthana1.17:102.1_2: paccayo. Āvajjanā maggādhipatīnaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:103.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena
patthana1.17:103.1_1: paccayo—purimā purimā maggārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ maggārammaṇānañca
patthana1.17:103.1_2: maggādhipatīnañca khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo. Āvajjanā maggārammaṇānañca
patthana1.17:104.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— purimā purimā
patthana1.17:104.1_1: maggādhipatī khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ maggādhipatīnaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:105.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— purimā purimā
patthana1.17:105.1_1: maggādhipatī khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ maggārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:106.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena
patthana1.17:106.1_1: paccayo—purimā purimā maggādhipatī khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ maggārammaṇānañca
patthana1.17:107.1_0: Maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena
patthana1.17:107.1_1: paccayo—purimā purimā maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ
patthana1.17:108.1_0: Maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggādhipatissa dhammassa anantarapaccayena
patthana1.17:108.1_1: paccayo—purimā purimā maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ
patthana1.17:109.1_0: Maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa
patthana1.17:109.1_1: anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca khandhā pacchimānaṁ
patthana1.17:109.1_2: pacchimānaṁ maggārammaṇānañca maggādhipatīnañca khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:110.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo …pe… (anantarasadisaṁ)
patthana1.17:110.1_1: sahajātapaccayena paccayo … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … nissayapaccayena paccayo
patthana1.17:111.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— anantarūpanissayo,
patthana1.17:112.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— anantarūpanissayo,
patthana1.17:113.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena
patthana1.17:114.1_0: Maggahetuko dhammo maggahetukassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. **Pakatūpanissayo**—paṭhamo
patthana1.17:114.1_1: maggo dutiyassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo …pe… tatiyo maggo catutthassa
patthana1.17:115.1: Maggahetuko dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. **Ārammaṇūpanissayo**—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:116.1_0: Maggahetuko dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana1.17:117.1: Maggahetuko dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. **Ārammaṇūpanissayo**—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:118.1_0: Maggahetuko dhammo maggahetukassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena
patthana1.17:118.1_1: paccayo. **Pakatūpanissayo**—paṭhamo maggo dutiyassa maggassa …pe… tatiyo maggo catutthassa
patthana1.17:119.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana1.17:119.1_2: maggassa …pe… tatiyo maggo catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo; paccavekkhaṇā
patthana1.17:120.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana1.17:121.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggahetukassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. **Pakatūpanissayo**—paṭhamo
patthana1.17:121.1_1: maggo dutiyassa maggassa …pe… tatiyo maggo catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:122.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena
patthana1.17:123.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggahetukassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena
patthana1.17:123.1_1: paccayo. **Pakatūpanissayo**—paṭhamo maggo dutiyassa maggassa …pe… tatiyo maggo catutthassa
patthana1.17:124.1_0: Maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena
patthana1.17:125.1_0: Maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggādhipatissa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena
patthana1.17:126.1_0: Maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa
patthana1.17:127.1: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. **Ārammaṇūpanissayo**—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:128.1_0: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggahetukassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena
patthana1.17:128.1_1: paccayo. **Pakatūpanissayo**—paṭhamo maggo dutiyassa maggassa …pe… tatiyo maggo catutthassa
patthana1.17:129.1_0: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggādhipatissa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena
patthana1.17:129.1_2: dutiyassa maggassa …pe… tatiyo maggo catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:130.1_0: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa
patthana1.17:131.1_0: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggahetukassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa
patthana1.17:131.1_2: …pe… tatiyo maggo catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:132.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā
patthana1.17:132.1_1: maggārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ maggārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:133.1: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo. (Anantarasadisaṁ. Nava pañhā kātabbā, āvajjanā na kātabbā.)
patthana1.17:134.1: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— sahajātā …pe…. (Nānākkhaṇikā natthi, sattarasa pañhā kātabbā.)
patthana1.17:135.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena
patthana1.17:135.1_1: paccayo … jhānapaccayena paccayo … maggapaccayena paccayo … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo
patthana1.17:135.1_2: … atthipaccayena paccayo (ime satta paccayā sattarasa pañhā hetusadisā) … natthipaccayena
patthana1.17:135.1_3: paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo (anantarasadisā) … avigatapaccayena paccayo. (Sattarasa pañhā.)
patthana1.17:136.1_0: Hetuyā sattarasa, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā ekavīsa, anantare nava, samanantare nava,
patthana1.17:136.1_1: sahajāte sattarasa, aññamaññe sattarasa, nissaye sattarasa, upanissaye ekavīsa, āsevane
patthana1.17:136.1_2: nava, kamme sattarasa, āhāre indriye jhāne magge sampayutte sattarasa, atthiyā sattarasa,
patthana1.17:136.1_3: natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate sattarasa. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.17:138.1: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:139.1: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:140.1: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:141.1: Maggahetuko dhammo maggahetukassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:142.1: Maggahetuko dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.17:145.1: Maggahetuko dhammo maggahetukassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.17:148.1: Maggādhipati dhammo maggahetukassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.17:150.1: Maggādhipati dhammo maggahetukassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:151.1: Maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:152.1: Maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggādhipatissa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:153.1: Maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:154.1: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:155.1: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggahetukassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:156.1: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggādhipatissa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:157.1: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:158.1: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggahetukassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:159.1_0: Nahetuyā ekavīsa, naārammaṇe sattarasa (naārammaṇe gahite pakatārammaṇampi upanissayārammaṇampi
patthana1.17:159.1_1: dvepi chijjanti), naadhipatiyā ekavīsa, naanantare nasamanantare nasahajāte naaññamaññe
patthana1.17:159.1_2: nanissaye naupanissaye napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke naāhāre
patthana1.17:159.1_3: naindriye najhāne namagge nasampayutte navippayutte noatthiyā nonatthiyā novigate
patthana1.17:161.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe sattarasa, naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare naupanissaye
patthana1.17:161.1_1: napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge
patthana1.17:163.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā ekavīsa, anantare nava, samanantare nava,
patthana1.17:163.1_1: sahajāte sattarasa, aññamaññe sattarasa, nissaye sattarasa, upanissaye ekavīsa, āsevane
patthana1.17:163.1_2: nava, kamme sattarasa, āhāre sattarasa, indriye jhāne magge sampayutte sattarasa,
patthana1.17:163.1_3: atthiyā sattarasa, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate sattarasa. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
